content.text: So, what do you like to do in your free time?
I like to go to yoga and drink milk to help me digest my large meals.
That sounds interesting! I am a barista, and I just started college. I am moving to be closer to my favorite pasta restaurant. I am proud of my ability to enjoy my free time.
That's awesome! I am glad you are enjoying your life. I am a bit of a klutz, but I always try to be careful around my pets.
That's good to hear! I love my family and they are always supportive of my music store and my love for Harry Potter.
That's great! I am glad you have a great support system. I lost my favorite 80s cassette tape in a fire, and I am still sad about it.
That's terrible! I am so sorry to hear that. I hope you find a new favorite tape.
Thank you! I am trying, but it's not easy.
I'm sure you will find one
